text.tspan: Plastic waste emitted to the ocean per capita vs. GDP per capita, 2019
Gross domestic product (GDP) per capita is measured in constant international-dollars which corrects for inflation
Per capita plastic waste emitted to the ocean
Source: Meijer et al. (2021), Data compiled from multiple sources by World Bank
